titleStmt.title: The Psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs of the Old & New testament, faithfully translated into English meeter. For the use, edification and comfort of the saints in publick and private, especially in New-England

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Chiswell at the Rose and Crown in St. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Incorrectly identified as Wing B2505A on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1843.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
